item.description:
TGIF Night Out!

Come dance to the great tunes of Them Apples from the Berkley School of Music in Boston. Bringing the true essence of the classic Motown Revues and your favorite dance tunes to the dance floor. Them Apples will entertain you with a full show of energy, showmanship and choreography.

City Side is a 5000sq. ft. live entertainment venue, and features two levels of entertainment includingÂ 2 Billiard tables, two bars, 16 hi def televisions, state of the art sound and light system as well as a fun, delicious menu.

The closer you arrive to 8:30, the better off you'll have a chance to get a seat.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at door for Deb's table
item.name: Dancing @ City Side with Them Apples
